medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began several days prior to admission on a night, gradually becoming worse. It is primarily suprapubic and towards the left lower quadrant (LLQ), described as sharp and constant, aggravated by movement. The patient also reports feeling bloated.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, history of hypercalcemia, left acoustic neuroma, history of vertigo and tinnitus, history of parathyroid adenoma removal.
